title: How to Browse Incognito Using Bing

steps.title: Open the taskbar at the top right where the ... icon is.
steps.content: Open the taskbar at the top right where the ... icon is. This will open up a list of options. [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Select New InPrivate Window from the list of options.
steps.content: Select New InPrivate Window from the list of options. This will open an incognito window. [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Search anything you want once you're in incognito mode.
steps.content: Search anything you want once you're in incognito mode. Remember that everything gets erased once you exit out of the tab and won't stay in your history.
